finding_info.desc: Detection of insertAdjacentHTML from non-constant definition. This can inadvertently expose users to cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks if this comes from user-provided input. If you have to use insertAdjacentHTML, consider using a sanitization library such as DOMPurify to sanitize your HTML.

finding_info.desc: This tag is missing an 'integrity' subresource integrity attribute. The 'integrity' attribute allows for the browser to verify that externally hosted files (for example from a CDN) are delivered without unexpected manipulation. Without this attribute, if an attacker can modify the externally hosted resource, this could lead to XSS and other types of attacks. To prevent this, include the base64-encoded cryptographic hash of the resource (file) you’re telling the browser to fetch in the 'integrity' attribute for all externally hosted files.
finding_info.title: html.security.audit.missing-integrity.missing-integrity in base.html - This tag is missing an 'integrity' subresource in...

status_detail: kind: external; justification: (ASH) Suppressing finding for rule 'html.security.audit.missing-integrity.missing-integrity' in 'templates/base.html' with reason: Base HTML template.The integrity checks not applicable
